::Epyon::

He reached the room, and went in. He began looking for what he could use
to make a crib. He grabed to chairs and put them together so the backs
wer opposite each other. The sides were high so the baby would not be
able to climb out. He then grabed some pillows and put them in it.
"This is the best crib for now Starice."
